actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow each veteran with an upgraded discharge to receive full educational benefits without regard to the date of the veterans' initial discharge from service.

summary.text: Extends veterans' educational benefits to any eligible veteran with an upgraded discharge without regard to the date of such veteran's initial discharge from the service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow each veteran with an upgraded discharge to receive full educational benefits without regard to the date of the veterans' initial discharge from service.
